document_data.name: Shift in the Winds
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shift in the Winds''' was a ritual observed by worshipers of [[Isis]], the Lady of All Love within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Description: The Shift in the Winds ritual involved [[priestess]]es of Isis offering their own thanks and chant to their [[goddess]] any time the weather changed favorably.
